text: Carrie is a 1952 American historical romance movie directed by William Wyler and was based on the 1900 novel Sister Carrie by Theodore Dreiser. It stars Laurence Olivier, Jennifer Jones, Miriam Hopkins, Eddie Albert, Ray Teal, Walter Baldwin, Barry Kelley and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. It was nominated for 2 Academy Awards in 1953. ==Other websites== * Category:1952 romance movies Category:1950s historical movies Category:American romance movies Category:Movies directed by William Wyler Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set in Chicago Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in the 1900s
title: Carrie (1952 movie)
